hero.title: THE HEART OF PUNTA DEL ESTE
hero.subtitle: Where exclusivity meets convenience

intro.label: Prime Location
intro.title: Perfectly positioned in Uruguay's most prestigious destination
intro.description: Located in the sought-after La Barra district, this property offers the perfect balance of privacy and accessibility. Just minutes from pristine beaches, world-class dining, and cultural attractions, while maintaining the tranquility of a gated community.

map.scrollDescription:
Explore Punta del Este, La Barra, Montoya and José Ignacio.
To move the map: click inside the map.
To zoom: Ctrl / Cmd + scroll.
map.scrollMobileDescription:
Explore Punta del Este, La Barra, Montoya and José Ignacio.
To move the map: Touch Inside the Map.
To zoom: Use Two Fingers or double tap.
map.title: Your New Neighborhood
map.description: Explore the main points of interest near La Cancillería
map.tokenDescription: Please enter your MapBox public token to display the interactive map. Get your token at

items.labarra:
3 minutes to La Barra
Restaurants and nightlife

playa-mansa.title: Playa Mansa
playa-mansa.description: Calm coastline, ideal for sunsets and families.

playa-brava.title: Playa Brava (La Mano)
playa-brava.description: The iconic ocean beach featuring the famous Hand sculpture.

puerto-pde.title: Punta del Este Harbor
puerto-pde.description: Promenade, gastronomy, and sea lion watching.

isla-gorriti.title: Gorriti Island
isla-gorriti.description: Natural reserve facing the peninsula, with beaches and forests.

isla-lobos.title: Lobos Island
isla-lobos.description: Home to the largest sea lion reserve in the Southern Hemisphere.

av-gorlero.title: Gorlero Avenue
av-gorlero.description: The main avenue, commercial and social hub.

playa-montoya.title: Playa Montoya
playa-montoya.description: Wide beach with strong waves, popular among surfers and youth.

playa-bikini.title: Playa Bikini
playa-bikini.description: Trendy beach spot in Manantiales, music and sunsets.

puente-la-barra.title: La Barra Bridge
puente-la-barra.description: The iconic undulating bridge designed by Leonel Viera.

centro-la-barra.title: La Barra Center
centro-la-barra.description: Nightlife, art galleries, and bohemian-chic style.

museo-del-mar.title: Museum of the Sea
museo-del-mar.description: Outstanding collection of marine and natural history.

casapueblo.title: Casapueblo
casapueblo.description: The inhabitable sculpture created by Carlos Páez Vilaró.

maca-atchugarry.title: Pablo Atchugarry Foundation (MACA)
maca-atchugarry.description: Contemporary art museum and sculpture park.

ralli.title: Ralli Museum
ralli.description: Latin American and surrealist art in Beverly Hills.

faro-jose-ignacio.title: José Ignacio Lighthouse
faro-jose-ignacio.description: The symbol of the most exclusive fishing village.

laguna-garzon.title: Laguna Garzón
laguna-garzon.description: Protected area for kitesurfing and nature.

bodega-garzon.title: Bodega Garzón
bodega-garzon.description: Luxury wine tourism among rolling hills and vineyards.

pueblo-garzon.title: Garzón Village
pueblo-garzon.description: Revitalized rural village with charm and olive oil tradition.

hero.title:
A REFINED RESIDENCE DESIGNED
FOR COMFORT AND PRIVACY
hero.subtitle:
Refined interiors. Expansive exteriors. Designed for comfort, privacy, and
connection with nature

intro.label: MAIN RESIDENCE
intro.title: LA CANCILLERÍA
intro.description:
The main residence of the luxury gated estate features five bedrooms,
spacious living and dining areas, a spacious kitchen, and multiple outdoor
spaces designed for entertaining and relaxation.
